claim: David Thewlis has had only one performance.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Other notable performances include the films Naked  (  for which he won the Best Actor award at Cannes Film Festival  )  , Dragonheart , Kingdom of Heaven , The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas , The Theory of Everything , Black Beauty , and Macbeth  (  in which he played King Duncan  )  .
